amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the McGovern-Dole International Food for Education and Child Nutrition Program Grants and to apply the savings of $180 million to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to eliminate the McGovern-Dole International Food for Education and Child Nutrition Program Grants and apply the savings of $180 million to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 303 (Roll no. 435).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 303 (Roll no. 435).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
